body:
There is some package depends on different version of `protobuf`,
The `protobuf@:2.5.0`  is a `AutotoolsPackage`, while the other version using `CMakePackage`.
So, is there any example we can put the the two package type in one package?
e.g.  `Ginkgo` (but show more detailed than it.)
title: How can I develop a package with different PackageClass by each version?
